segments.text: Mrs . Lee , I ’ Ve stayed here for almost a week . And I really must leave tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please feel free to stay as long as you want . You know you ’ re always welcome here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . You ’ Ve been so nice to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything else I can do for you before your leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thanks . You ’ Ve done a lot for me already . Thank you for everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t mention it . I ’ Ve really enjoyed your company .
segments.speaker: S2
